column3: Just to understand the context: what changed since https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16140#issuecomment-498848447? :-)\n\n> I think we should also move the EOL policy from the website into the repo, but that might be also good for a follow up pull request.
With "good for a follow up pull request" I meant that it might be controversial. My primary point was that the policy should only be maintained in one place.
@practicalswift This was discussed on the IRC meeting yesterday.
